attributes.action: Re-surface Roads In Banbury, Oxfordshire, Due To Poor Maintainence and Condition
attributes.background: The road surfaces throughout the town of Banbury, Oxfordshire have been deteriorating for a long time and with the proposal of new housing developments in the town, roads should be resurfaced now to minimise delays in the future.

rejection.details:
The maintenance of roads in Banbury is the responsibility of Cherwell District Council.

You may wish to take the matter up with the Council.  Information on how to petition Cherwell District Council, and relevant contacts at the Council, is available in the leaflet here:
http://www.cherwell.gov.uk/media/pdf/a/t/Cherwell_District_Council_Petitions_Scheme.pdf
